at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals damage to any target equal to the number of shrines you control
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals x damage to that player where x is the number of untapped lands they controlled at the beginning of this turn
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of artifacts they control
at the beginning of each opponent's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards in that player's hand
at the beginning of each player's end step cardname deals x damage to that player where x is the number of untapped lands they control
at the beginning of your upkeep cardname deals n damage to you
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals n damage to them
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of snow lands they control
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of nonbasic lands they control
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals n damage to that player
at the beginning of each player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of swamps they control
at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep cardname deals damage to that player equal to the number of curses attached to them
